name: Powerhouse of a Cell
description: This game was made for the "My First Game Jam: Winter 2020." My wife and I are musicians but we've always wanted to try making games. The assets were a lot of fun to make. The "learning coding while making a game simultaneously through several disparate tutorials" was a completely different thing altogether! All in all, we had a lot of fun and it was a good learning experience. Who knows? We might polish up the game to be more than it is right now for a future release.
